name: Cube Defense
detailed_description:
You left alone camping in the mountains ... But during this time a virus has invaded the country and a cubic horde is heading towards you!

Arm yourself and overcome waves of enemies. Fill up with arms and ammunition between each wave.

How much cubic wave can you eliminate?



Features :

■ 2 maps!
■ More than 30 levels!
■ 5 different weapons!
■ Shop system in game!
■ Addictive!
■ Low Poly decors!
■ Relaxing gameplay!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphique
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
